import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { PhoneCall, MapPin, Clock, Car, Droplet, Zap, Truck, Menu, X, Instagram, Facebook, Check, ChevronRight } from 'lucide-react'; // Custom TikTok icon component since it's not in lucide-react const TikTok = () => ( ); // Fade-in animation component const FadeIn = ({ children, delay = 0 }) => { const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { const timer = setTimeout(() => { setIsVisible(true); }, delay); return () => clearTimeout(timer); }, [delay]); return (
{children}
); }; const Home = () => { const [mobileMenuOpen, setMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [isScrolled, setIsScrolled] = useState(false); // Handle scroll for navbar effects useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { if (window.scrollY > 50) { setIsScrolled(true); } else { setIsScrolled(false); } }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, []); const testimonials = [ { name: "James Wilson", text: "The team at Daniel's did an amazing job on my car. It looks brand new again!", rating: 5 }, { name: "Sarah Thompson", text: "Professional service that came right to my office. Couldn't be more convenient!", rating: 5 }, { name: "Michael Rodriguez", text: "Best detailing service in the area. My car hasn't looked this good since I bought it.", rating: 5 } ]; return (

{/* About Section - Updated for a new business */}

About Daniel's Mobile Detailing

Welcome to Daniel's Mobile Detailing, Southampton's newest premier mobile car valeting service. While we may be new to the business, our passion for automotive care and attention to detail sets us apart.

Founded in 2025, we believe that everyone deserves a showroom-quality vehicle without the inconvenience of traveling to a detailing shop. Our mission is to bring professional detailing services directly to your doorstep, saving you time and hassle.

What we lack in years, we make up for with enthusiasm, cutting-edge techniques, and a customer-first approach. Every vehicle we touch is treated with the utmost care using only premium, eco-friendly products that deliver outstanding results.

Convenient Mobile Service

We come to your home or workplace

Premium Products

Using only the best eco-friendly cleaning solutions

Customer Satisfaction

Your happiness is our top priority

Professional Service

Making every vehicle shine like new

{/* Reason 3 */}

Book appointments at times that work for you, including weekends and evenings by arrangement.

{/* Reason 4 */}

100% Satisfaction

If you're not completely satisfied with our service, we'll make it right. That's our promise.
